flawed_nl_solution:
She has 2 dogs and it takes 20 minutes to groom just 1 dog so it takes her 2*20 = <<2*20=40>>40 minutes per day to groom 2 dogs
In 30 days, she will have spent 30*40 = <<30*40=120>>120 minutes grooming her dogs
There are 60 minutes in an hour so she spends 120/60 = <<120/60=2>>2 hours grooming her dogs
